item.description: Tesla finally releases Full Self-Driving Beta v9: hereâ€™s what it looks like (3 minute read) Tesla has released its Full Self-Driving Beta v9 update.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-08
item.description: Uber sells its self-driving unit to Aurora (2 minute read) Uber has sold its self-driving unit, Advanced Technologies Group (ATG), to competitor Aurora Innovation.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-23
item.description: FDA approves remdesivir to treat COVID-19 (3 minute read) The FDA has approved remdesivir as a treatment for COVID-19 in hospitalized patients.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-21
item.description: Elon Musk Says Autopilot Self-Driving Beta Is Rolling Out Tonight (2 minute read) Tesla’s Full Self-Driving (FSD) will be available in a small closed beta test beginning next week.
